
Assemble ../../../as/ptn1_call.casl (0)

Assemble ../../../as/ptn1.casl (0)

Label::::
PTN1 ---> #0005
MAIN ---> #0000

Assemble ../../../as/ptn1_call.casl (1)
../../../as/ptn1_call.casl:1:MAIN    START
../../../as/ptn1_call.casl:2:        LAD     GR1,5
	#0000	#1210
	#0001	#0005
../../../as/ptn1_call.casl:3:        CALL    PTN1
	#0002	#8000
	#0003	#0005
../../../as/ptn1_call.casl:4:        RET
	#0004	#8100
../../../as/ptn1_call.casl:5:        END

Assemble ../../../as/ptn1.casl (1)
../../../as/ptn1.casl:1:PTN1	START
../../../as/ptn1.casl:2:       	PUSH    0,GR1
	#0005	#7001
	#0006	#0000
../../../as/ptn1.casl:3:	    LAD     GR2,15
	#0007	#1220
	#0008	#000F
../../../as/ptn1.casl:4:        SUBL    GR2,GR1
	#0009	#2721
../../../as/ptn1.casl:5:        LD      GR1,GR2
	#000A	#1412
../../../as/ptn1.casl:6:        LD      GR2,=#8000
	#0011	#8000
	#000B	#1020
	#000C	#0011
../../../as/ptn1.casl:7:        SRA     GR2,0,GR1
	#000D	#5121
	#000E	#0000
../../../as/ptn1.casl:8:        POP     GR1
	#000F	#7110
../../../as/ptn1.casl:9:        RET
	#0010	#8100
../../../as/ptn1.casl:10:        END
